boardgame.name: Empires in Arms
boardgame.description: (from the back of the box - Avalon Hill edition:)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;EMPIRES IN ARMS is a game covering the major elements of diplomacy and warfare during the Napoleonic Wars of 1805-1815. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;YOU, as a player, are the absolute monarch of a major European power (Austria, France. Great Britain. Prussia. Russia, Spain or Turkey) and guide that nation through the maze of conflicting interests and ambitions that characterized Napoleonic Europe. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each major power has its own individual economic; military and geographic advantages and disadvantages. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players negotiate alliances. dictate peace treaties. administer conquests and conduct warfare on land and sea by maneuvering corps and fleets in the constant struggle for survival and prestige._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Numerous Scenarios : These vary in size and length from the four-Turn. two-player 1805 Scenario to the 132 Turn, seven-player Grand Campaign Game (1805-1815)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Great Military Leaders : Napoleon of France. Nelson of Great Britain. Blucher of Prussia. Prince Charles of Austria and many, many more_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Uncontrolled Major Powers : Rules that allow the realistic use of extra major powers in campaign games when less than seven players are available_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Unique Combat Systems : Land combat takes into account the effects of leadership, grand-tactics and the numbers, morale and types of troops present. Sieges include stormings and sorties. Sea commanders try to hold the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;wind-gauge_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. Massed shore batteries protect harbors from blockading enemy fleets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull; Economic System : Money and manpower availability from home provinces and conquests determine recruiting and national strength._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;CONTENTS:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1008 Die-Cut Counters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two 25_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; by 35_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; mapboard_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2 Dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Double sided Display Charts/Forms_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2 Identical Double sided Charts/tables reference page_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;7 National Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;(BGG description :)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A game covering the major elements of diplomacy and warfare during the Napoleonic Wars of 1805-1815. Each player is absolute monarch of one of the major powers(England, France, Austria, Russia, Prussia, Spain and Turkey). The full game lasts 132 turns 1 for each month approx playing time is 100-150 hours. Each month is split into 4 phases:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Diplomatic phase where players negotiate deals, forge alliances etc. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Reinforcement phase where each player in sequence adds reinforcements due. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Naval phase each player conducts naval moves in sequence._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Land phase where each player moves and fights with his armies in sequence. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;And then every third month an additional phase is added:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Economic phase, which is where players collect resources and purchase future reinforcements. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To win the game each nation needs to amass victory points these are scored in the economic phase and are based on your nations political status. As status always gravitates to a central position players must continually _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;politik_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; to reach their goal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Guns, Dice, Butter Episode V: May 25, 2012
I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 45: Noble failures, and Eclipse on the iPad

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: missing 2 army markers

This is the Avalon Hill version. The box top shows major wear, and the bottom two corners are split. However, the inside components are in very good condition. The pieces are all punched and bagged, but I did not count them to see if every one of them is there. However, all the countersheet frames are included, so you can double-check to see if anything is missing (sold as is). All the original inserts are also included.
Played only once. Has not touched the game since then. Everything is intact.

Box has a lot of scuffing, but is otherwise in good shape with no split corners. The game is missing 8 counters. They are: 1 Turkish _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Unit 1 Austrian Political Status Marker 1 Austrian Economic Status Marker 1 (of three) Austrian Victory Point (+/-) Marker All four Austrian Generals Their stats are: Mack: 1.3.4.A Charles: 4.4.6.B John: 1.1.2.C Schwarzenberg: 2.2.3.C Now I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t poured through the rules to see if having replacement counters for these would in ANY WAY effect the game, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m inclined to doubt that it would be an issue. Pictures available upon request.

Very, very minor scuffing on box. Never been played. Almost all counters have yet to be punched. This is one of those games that I would have loved to have played but just sat on a bookshelf for lack of time and opponents.
Punched, complete. Box has very minor shelf wear.

Rating should be better than good as the game has never been played - everything there, all counters unpunched, but box shows some wear and it looks like the rulebook has tasted some coffee once.. Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen. Usually shipping a single (regular sized) boardgame (surface) costs 12.90€ worldwide and 8.60€ within Europe. Smaller games ship cheaper. Of course multiple games can be combined.
Never played, all counters unpunched. UK shipping would be £5.00. Elsewhere please ask.
Empires in Arms. Avalon Hill. Box shows some shelfwear and the top lid is split in two corners. Contents are like new and counters are UNPUNCHED.

Box is in okay condition: some scuffing and such but not too bad. Counters are unpunched, the maps look good and clean. I likely never bothered too much with this one because -urghh- the rulebook is missing. I see that the rules are available online. Other than that, the box contents are very very clean.
Still in shrinkwrap! Additionally (or separately) it is possible to buy the ORIGINAL counter sheet from the General 30-6 from me.

This game is complete, and looks like only a single scenario has been played. Counters come partially punched: many more still in the sprues, the rest in plastic baggies. The map is in very good shape, all charts and tables clean and present. The rules booklet somewhat more heavily used. Staples have been removed, but the whole booklet is intact and whole. The box shows minor scuffing and some sun fading, but all corners intact. Business reply card and game catalog from 1986 present. Please write with any questions.

This is the original 1983 large box edition by Australian Design Group. The game is punched and complete, but has never been played, so the components are in excellent shape. The box has some wear and creasing. One of the box sides is split and has been repaired with clear tape.
Punched, complete. Some moderate wear on the box, mostly isolated to the edge lid edges.

Game is mint in shrinkwrap. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in perfect condition. Domestic shipping will be $9.00. International buyers should message me for a shipping quote. Thanks for looking and be sure to check out my other games for sale.
Game is almost unplayed. Handful of counters have been punched. Map has been unfolded but undamaged/unstained. 1 Austrian depot is missing, all other counters confirmed. Game is otherwise complete.

Box = Acceptable Components = Like New Good News: Unpunched, this is the ADG version with a little heavier cardstock map than the Avalon Hill version. Bad News: Box taped and not in too good a shape, the ADG rulebook is less colorful than the AH one. The picture shows the actual game offered. I ask you only to pay actual shipping cost. Even better, come by and pick it up, maybe we can figure out how to play this awesome game over Vassal!

100% complete and unpunched. Contents in excellent condition. Never played. Box out of shrinkwrap, but in very good condition just some small scuff marks on the corners. Will ship to United States only. Insurance extra.
Please look at my photo to see the condition of the game; if buyer will be from EU, esp. germany, money transfer (german:Ueberweisung) to my german bank account is preferred
Opened, complete, unpunched. The box has light to moderate wear, and all the game components are in at least _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;very good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; condition.
Have a punched ADG version available for Sale.
Counters are unpunched and pristine as well as maps and charts. Rules have a little dinginess on back cover. Box has some wear from _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;overstacking_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.
Punched and played but everything is intact and complete. Copied articles from various GENERALS included. The maps have been mounted on four sheets of plywood.
Box concaved and worn, but contents complete and very good, counters unpunched.
Partially punched, complete. The box has moderate wear and was taped shut at one point. All game components are in at least very good condition.
The beautiful multiplayer game ever seen!!! Never used, like new. Some detached counters, the most unpunched.
70+% unpunched. punched counters are bagged. great looking box! US buyer agrees to pay for priority mail shipping. International bidders please contact me to discuss shipping before bidding.
Add-on counters from GENERAL-magazine (see scan). Unpunched.
Punched, complete. Rules and player aids are in very good condition, as a french translation was used instead. Box is nice, but has 2 splits corners. All in all, a very good player copy.
Excellent condition - opened but never been played.

Gamebox is in good condition, but with a damaged corner and some shelfwear(see photo). The counters have been punched, verified to be all present, most have been trimmed and are organized in bags. To more easily distinguish the different corp counters the back of the counters have been colored with their national colors (see photo). The maps, rules and charts are in very good condition except for the Minor Power chart that has some discoloration. The game has not been exposed to and is free of any odors. USA mailing cost is $9.00 for the first game. Add $2.00 for each additional game. International Shipping: Canada and Mexico: $25.00 for first game. Add $5.00 for each additional game. All other international shipping: $30.00 for first game. Add $5.00 for each additional game.
The original ADG version in As New condition. Opened only to confirm contents.
Empires in Arms, 1983. Some box wear but no split corners. Played several times back in the 80_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s. All components present and in good condition - little to no visible wear.

This is the Avalon Hill edition of the game. The box has some damage on the edges but no split corners. There are traces of mould on the inside of the box and on the maps, but the game is definitely playable, all components are present and in good shape. French rules translation included if you want them. Pictures are available on request. Contact me for a shipping quote (I use the french postal service without overcharge). Thanks for looking.
UNPUNCHED!!! COMPLETE!!! All Original parts!!! Opened from shrink and looked at the rules, then opened maybe twice more. Only some slight shelf wear. See pictures!

Punched and played, but all parts are presents. The box and some chits are slightly consumed, but its playable without problems. Are included many grey chits (copy) that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve printed for myself.

BOX: Small scratches at a corner and edge. INSTRUCTIONS: As new. (never used). I can also send you the spanish translation booklet, which has half of its pages unbound. MAPS: Tears in some of the points where the paper foldings cross. (Very easily fixable with a little cellotape.) PIECES / CHITS: they´ve been punched (the game´s been played), but they´re all there. They are separated by families in ziplog plastic bags. NATIONAL SHEETS / GAME SHEET (x2): All there, in good condition. The Status card and one of the two copies of the game sheet have been slightly yellowished by sun.The Status card has been folded, too. OVERALL: Second hand _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; used, but great condition. SHIPPING: I will ship worldwide, at exact cost. No handling fee. I will use Spanish Post (Correos); you can choose air or surface mail. If you are interested, contact me at corsocabron@gmail.com and I´ll find your shipping charge. PAYMENT: PayPal accepted, but contact me before for the correct e-address.

Opened but unpunched, box in excellent condition.

Box and rules are fine. The maps are laminated. The counters are punched and I was told when I got it that a few counters are missing but I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t inventoried it so I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know which ones.

Complete unpunched Avalon Hill edition. All components inside the box in good condition except for slight staining on the backs of the maps. However the box top has 2 split corners and is scuffed along one edge.

ADG version from _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;83. Box has age spots but not much shelf wear. Counters punched and in a most are in a counter tray, some in ziplock bags. BONUS copy of AH version rules which are xeroxed but bound in rulebook form. Both sets have some highlights/underlines. Some extra xeroxed charts. Map in great shape.
Was £75, now £50! :) Unpunched, unplayed. Original dice and rulebook have been replaced (A4 printout with link to online source). Minimal scuff to box.

Would list as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;very good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; but box top has one corner split. Pieces are punched/sorted/labeled and in baggies. Will discuss shipping. THIS IS THE ADG EDITION. Box contains original rules and the actual (not copied) AH Empires in Arms rules (don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know how that happened :) Trying to make room by selling part of my game collection.

Unpunched - Complete - Excellent shape. See the picture. Box has a little shelf wear, but everything else is looks completely unused. USA shipping is $10. International buyers welcome. Shipping will be at cost. I can provide a qoute ahead of time too.
Unpunched, pristine contents. Box has minor wear.

In near mint condition, unpunched and book opened only a couple of times. Shipping cost to Europe (with tracking) : 15€ Shipping cost to US (with tracking) : 25€

Unpunched. Some corner and edge wear. Back of box has a piece of tape on one corner but the corner has not split and appears to be fine. Crease along one side of the back of the box. Delivery of your choice and you pay for delivery only. Paypal please

Out-of-print older game, unwrapped but unused and all pieces are still unpunched. Missing the rule book, but all is in new condition aside from that. Rules can be found online here: http://www.empires-in-arms.de/rules/rules_frames.htm Will accept UK cheques or PayPal.
Box has extremely slight wear. All components are present and in pristine condition. Unpunched and unplayed. You could give this game as a present. Please see pictures.
Good condition, complete with counters stored in ziploc bags. Light shelf wear to box. Rulebook has light wear.P _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; P in Uk will be £5

Unpunched. Contents are in excellent condition. Box very structurally sounds with no splits or cracks however it does have a goodly amount of shelf wear. Delivery of your choice. Paypal, cashiers check, check or cash as long as I can spend it.

Empires in Arms is a high complexity strategy game published by Avalon Hill in 1986. It is the Avalon Hill Game Company’s trademark for its game of Napoleonic Diplomacy and Warfare. Included in this is an expansion: Viva La Revolution which consists of 15 leader counters. There is also included a photo copy of the rules from the General magazine, Volume 25, issue 4. The game is complete and in good condition. The box shows moderate shelf wear. The rules are in good shape but do show some yellowing around the spine. All charts are in very good shape. All charts have written on them “G. Milks”. The two maps are clean and in excellent shape. The counters are cleanly punched and sorted into two counter trays. The counter tray lids are taped onto the bottoms to reduce the amount of counters shifting during shipping. The two dice are clean and ready for rolling. The complete list of components are: 1 x 48 page rule book 1 x 4 photocopied pages from General Magazine covering the Viva La Revolution expansion 1 x 2 page list of optional rules (created by owner) 1 x West map 1 x East map 8 x National cards ( Austria, France, Great Britain, Minor Countries, Prussia, Russia, Spain, Turkey 1 x Political Status Display 1 x Game card with the most commonly used charts 2 x 6-sided dice 800 half inch counters: 108 France: 28 control flags 9 leaders 34 garrison strength markers 32 militia strength markers 1 political status marker 1 economic status marker 3 victory point counters 89 Russia: 14 control flags 7 leaders 30 garrison strength markers 27 militia strength markers 1 political status marker 1 economic status marker 6 Cossack/Freikorps counters 3 victory point counters 70 Prussia: 10 control flags 4 leaders 24 garrison strength markers 26 militia strength markers 1 political status marker 1 economic status marker 1 Cossack/Freikorps counters 3 victory point counters 60 Austria: 4 leaders 28 garrison strength markers 22 militia strength markers 1 political status marker 1 economic status marker 1 Cossack/Freikorps counters 3 victory point counters 60 Great Britain: 4 leaders 27 garrison strength markers 24 militia strength markers 1 political status marker 1 economic status marker 3 victory point counters 85 Spain: 5 control flags 3 leaders 26 garrison strength markers 23 militia strength markers 23 guerilla counters 1 political status marker 1 economic status marker 3 victory point counters 67 Turkey: 7 control flags 3 leaders 52 garrison strength markers 1 political status marker 1 economic status marker 3 victory point counters 1 Poland: 1 control flag 11 combat chits: 2 x outflank , 1 x (escalated assault, assault, defend, echelon, probe, counter attack, escalated counter attack, cordon, withdraw) 1 x year 1 x month 247 Neutral Counters: 6 x political markers (C. of the Rhine, K. of Bavaria, K. of Italy, K. of Westphal(ia), Ottoman Empire, Poland) 174 garrison strength markers 67 militia strength markers 208 5/8” counters: 30 French: 8 major power depot 14 infantry 4 Cavalry 4 ships 32 Russia: 8 major power depot 16 infantry 5 Cavalry 3 ships 17 Prussia: 7 major power depot 9 infantry 1 ship 27 Austria: 9 major power depot 14 infantry 3 Cavalry 1 ships 22 Britain: 8 major power depot 6 infantry 1 Cavalry 7 ships 20 Spain: 8 major power depot 8 infantry 1 Cavalry 3 ships 26 Turkey: 7 major power depot 12 infantry 5 Cavalry 2 ships 34 Neutral: 28 corps 6 ships I take great care to package any item I ship. I use filler to mitigate any crushing and heavy cardboard to protect the box. Additional pictures are available upon request. Thank you for looking.
Venta a España por Transferencia, resto de Europa Paypal.
Avalon Hill edition. All components in near new condition. Mostly unpunched. $10 priority shipping to anywhere in U.S.

Unpunched. Not mint but very very nice. Contents in excellent condition and handled minimally. Box exhibits some minor shelf and corner wear with one minor corner crease on the front of the box. Straight, square and all 4 corners very solid - no weakness at all. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Rare Napoleonic coins encouraged. Combine shipping on multiple buys.
All components present _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; in good condition. Counters have corners clipped. Box has no damage.

This is the original Avalon Hill version. Box is in very good condition with minimal shelf wear. Counters are excellent, stored in ziploc bags, and the maps are in excellent condition as well. Dwolla or Paypal preferred (Paypal adds 3%), personal check in US funds drawn on a US bank OK, but I will ship only when check clears. Canada: will have to find shipping charges and will charge actual shipping fees).
Still in the original shrink. No tears or damage whatsoever! Buyer to pay only actual shipping.

Mint and unpunched. In excellent condition with some additional counters from the AH General.

Removed from shrinkwrap because I received it in an auction lot and wanted to make sure it had not been reshrinked. Everything is pristine as if factory new, nothing touched other than a visual inventory.

Oh yes it is!! Shrinkwrap copy. Box looks brand new with no damage. One microscopic hole in the shrink on the back of the box. 26 years old and mint. Wonder if you get that new game smell after that long?? Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship on multiple orders.
Avalon Hill edition. Game in nice condition. Punched but complete

*** this copy is missing the maps *** this is a very good copy and everything is in great shape, however, the maps are hard laminated and i cannot come up with a way to realistically ship them ? i think there are files available now to make your own, or you can pay for shipping, or you can pick them up locally or at a future bgg.con Please geekmail me with any questions. Box, counters (punched, sorted in labeled trays), reference sheets, country sheets, forms, and rule book all in excellent condition. In the box there are also copies of strategy articles. Also included are the 15 die-cut variant counters (unpunched) for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Vive La Revolution_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; which were in The General Vol 25. No. 2. The map is in overall acceptable condition (In order to keep the map is pristine shape, it was cut into sections and laminated; this proved a less than ideal method; it is complete and usable). Shipping is $12.00 in the U.S.
ADG version plus AH version--a nice set given the much bigger maps from the ADG box. Reserved for Matt Gustafson, auction win.
Unpunched and complete. Box has minimal shelfwear but has some tape on the sides.
Unpunched and complete.

This is the much superior ADG first edition in the big box. Game is punched and sorted in plastic counter tray. The heavy stock coated maps are as new, as are the counters. There are several sheets of errata from ADG. The rulebook has no writing in it but shows signs of having been read and has one very small stain on the front cover. Game is mostly in very good condition - of course there is a lot of shelfwear - esspecially at the backside of the box. All the Playeraids for the countries are there and in very good condition, just on the austrian playeraid is a little smudge ( look at the picture) The game is otherwise very clean and does not smell. (Well, might sound strange, but I made bad experiences with old stinky or mouldy games) seems that the maps, wich are overall in very good condition have been pleated allready very often and show therefore (very!) minor damage on one inner edge (view example -below corfu) but that is really very small in size. - but hey - this monster is 31 years old - probably older than you!!! :o) There is some extra stuff in it for the geek in you: Some printed strategy guides and proposals for optional rules and a photocopy (?) of extra counters from the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;general_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;-magazine. I think that you can have fun with this version for the next 15 Years at least if you take a bit care for the components - that means, you have enpough time for one full campaign!!! :-)
